title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When previewing and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the expected result is that the default values should be shown in the value box, allowing the user to modify only the desired parameter. However, the actual result is that in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, all values are empty, requiring the user to input all values.
OB: When previewing the report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, all values in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog are empty.
EB: When previewing the report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the default values should be shown in the value box in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog. This would allow the user to modify only the desired parameter.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Preview the report.
3. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
4. Verify that all values in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog are empty.
